messages.subject: Help needed for the Homeschool Hike Bike event
messages.msgSnippet: Hi. I am still looking for folks to set up Hike and Bike events in many ares. If you can possibly help, please email me at : homeschoolhikebike@hotmail.com or
messages.messageBody:
Hi. I am still looking for folks to set up Hike and Bike events in
many ares. If you can possibly help, please email me at :
homeschoolhikebike@... or oceanblue_1000@...

Please check out the website for this at:
http://www.freewebs.com/homeschoolhikebike/


Pebs
Here is some info from it:




ANNUAL HOMESCHOOL HIKE/BIKE EVENT
The homeschool hiking/biking annual event began in may 2005 as a way
to gain recognition for homeschooling as well as getting some
exercise, group involvement, and introducing homeschoolers and their
families to hiking and biking in the great outdoors!!
When?
It is an annual event now and will be held each year the last full
week in May all across the United States. We are asking for
individuals and groups involved in homeschooling to set up events in
their areas.


How do we get involved?
Your event may be as simple as putting a press release in the
newspaper to get all your homeschooling buddies together for a hike or
bike. You may make your event in varying skill levels if you would
like for homeschoolers with varying skills. Maybe one person or group
in your area can set up a hiking event and another can set up the
biking event. Or yous may want to work with many homeschooling groups
to have one big event. The possibilites are many, and I would love to
hear your ideas.


Contact us
If you would like to set up a group event in your area, please send
your name, email address, phone, city and state to me at:
homeschoolhikebike@... . I will get back with you and will
then list the contact info under your state and area on the group map
site. Please feel free to download a copy of the press release to send
to your local newspaper by clicking on the press release link. Please
fill in your appropriate info in the spaces provided. If you would
like us to contact your local newspaper, please let us know and we
would be glad to send them the info. Just let us know the newspapers
name and phone number/email along with your info : Date, Time, place,
contact info. I would appreciate it if you would send some pictures to
us after your event so we may post them here on our site. You may want
to send one to your local newspaper as well with a recap of the events.
Please enjoy your hike and bike event this year and stay tuned for
next years event as well.


Press Release
Please feel free to download a copy of the press release to send to
your local newspaper by clicking on the press release link. Please
fill in your appropriate info in the spaces provided. If you would
like us to contact your local newspaper, please let us know and we
would be gald to send them the info. Just let us know the newspapers
name and phone number/email along with your info : Date, Time, place,
contact info.



Homeschool Hike Bike Event, Its coordinators, volunteers, or anyone
invloved are not responsible for any injuries or mishaps that may
ocur. This event is an event you participate in at your own risk! We
assume no liabilites!
